DOC.brief_title: iConquerMS™ - A Patient-Powered Research Network Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study create Multiple Sclerosis Patient-Powered Research Network ( MS-PPRN ) include least 20,000 people multiple sclerosis ( MS ) contribute data health topic . Survey data make available research scientist study MS similar disease . Our goal use data answer question researcher people MS regard disease , include cause , treatment , topic . The MS-PPRN part national network conduct research call PCORnet , National Patient-Centered Clinical Research Network . PCORnet support Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Institute ( PCORI ) . As MS-PPRN part PCORnet , data collect survey complete may also share researcher study disease within PCORnet network . While MS-PPRN focus enrol people MS , people without MS also welcome participate research study . This study conduct online via iConquerMS.org website . This ongoing study last indefinite period time .
DOC.criteria: 21 year age old time inform consent . Unwilling unable provide inform consent .
